snippet: Among Mr. Harrison’s books was “Make Room! Make Room!” which was made into the film “Soylent Green.”
abstract: Harry Harrison, prolific writer of satiric science fiction, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Among Mr. Harrison’s books was “Make Room! Make Room!” which was made into the film “Soylent Green.”

headline.seo: Harry Harrison, a Prolific Writer of Satiric Science Fiction, Dies at 87
headline.main: Harry Harrison, a Prolific Writer of Satiric Science Fiction, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Harry Harrison, 87, Prolific Writer of Satiric Science Fiction
